name: ROAD HOMEWARD
description: ROAD HOMEWARD-an adventure with a view from the first or third person(the Kind you can change yourself), in which you will play for a character with a car that got lost.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7 Processor: AMD FX(tm)-6100 Six-Core Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7700 Series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
